title: Play video content
precondition: App is installed and addon with content is configured
steps: 1. Open the app 2. Navigate to any movie or series 3. Select a stream source 4. Tap play button
expected_result: Video starts playing with audio and video synchronized

title: Pause and resume playback
steps: 1. Tap the screen to show controls 2. Tap the pause button 3. Wait 3 seconds 4. Tap the play button
expected_result: Video pauses immediately when pause is tapped and resumes from the same position when play is tapped

title: Seek forward 10 seconds
steps: 1. Tap the screen to show controls 2. Tap the forward skip button (10s)
expected_result: Video advances 10 seconds forward and continues playing

title: Seek backward 10 seconds
precondition: Video is currently playing with at least 15 seconds elapsed
steps: 1. Tap the screen to show controls 2. Tap the backward skip button (10s)
expected_result: Video rewinds 10 seconds backward and continues playing

title: Adjust playback speed
steps: 1. Tap the screen to show controls 2. Open playback speed options 3. Select 1.5x speed
expected_result: Video plays at 1.5x speed with adjusted audio pitch

title: Select audio track
precondition: Video with multiple audio tracks is playing
steps: 1. Tap the screen to show controls 2. Open audio track selector 3. Select a different audio track
expected_result: Audio switches to the selected track without interrupting video playback

title: Enable subtitles
steps: 1. Tap the screen to show controls 2. Open subtitle selector 3. Select a subtitle track
expected_result: Subtitles appear on screen synchronized with the audio

title: Disable subtitles
precondition: Video is playing with subtitles enabled
steps: 1. Tap the screen to show controls 2. Open subtitle selector 3. Select Off or None
expected_result: Subtitles are hidden from the screen

title: Select external subtitle track
precondition: Video is playing and external subtitles are available
steps: 1. Tap the screen to show controls 2. Open subtitle selector 3. Select an external subtitle source
expected_result: External subtitles load and display correctly

title: Adjust brightness (Mobile)
precondition: Video is playing on Android Mobile or iOS
steps: 1. Slide vertically on the left side of the screen
expected_result: Screen brightness adjusts according to gesture direction

title: Adjust volume (Mobile)
precondition: Video is playing on Android Mobile or iOS
steps: 1. Slide vertically on the right side of the screen
expected_result: Volume adjusts according to gesture direction with visual indicator

title: Buffer indicator display
steps: 1. Start playing a video 2. Observe during initial load or when network is slow
expected_result: Buffer indicator (loading spinner) is displayed while video is buffering

title: Resume playback from last position
precondition: Previously watched video with saved progress exists
steps: 1. Open a video that was previously partially watched 2. Start playback
expected_result: Video resumes from the last watched position instead of the beginning

title: Toggle aspect ratio
steps: 1. Tap the screen to show controls 2. Tap the aspect ratio button
expected_result: Video aspect ratio cycles through available options (fit/fill/zoom) with visual indicator

title: Controls auto-hide timeout
precondition: Video is playing with controls visible
steps: 1. Tap the screen to show controls 2. Do not interact for 5 seconds
expected_result: Controls automatically hide after the timeout period

title: Skip intro with AniSkip
precondition: Anime content with AniSkip data is playing and intro segment begins
steps: 1. Play an anime episode 2. Wait for intro segment to start
expected_result: Skip Intro button appears allowing user to skip to end of intro

title: Skip intro with IntroDB
precondition: Content with IntroDB data is playing and intro segment begins
steps: 1. Play content with intro data from IntroDB 2. Wait for intro segment to start
expected_result: Skip Intro button appears allowing user to skip to end of intro

title: Toggle skip intro setting
precondition: App is open and Settings is accessible
steps: 1. Go to Settings 2. Find skip intro toggle 3. Toggle the setting off 4. Play content with intro data
expected_result: Skip Intro button does not appear when setting is disabled

title: Submit intro timestamp to IntroDB
precondition: IntroDB API key is configured and content is playing
steps: 1. Play content without existing intro data 2. Mark intro start and end points 3. Submit to IntroDB
expected_result: Intro timestamps are submitted successfully

title: Double tap to skip forward
precondition: Video is playing on touch-enabled device
steps: 1. Double tap on the right side of the screen
expected_result: Video skips forward 10 seconds

title: Double tap to skip backward
precondition: Video is playing on touch-enabled device
steps: 1. Double tap on the left side of the screen
expected_result: Video skips backward 10 seconds

title: Slide to seek
precondition: Video is playing on touch-enabled device
steps: 1. Touch and hold on the progress bar area 2. Slide left or right
expected_result: Seek preview shows and video seeks to the selected position on release

title: Show controls on tap
precondition: Video is playing with controls hidden
steps: 1. Tap once on the center of the screen
expected_result: Player controls become visible

title: Install addon from URL
precondition: App is open and Addon Manager is accessible
steps: 1. Go to Addon Manager 2. Tap Add Addon 3. Enter a valid addon manifest URL 4. Confirm installation
expected_result: Addon is installed and appears in the addon list with its catalogs available

title: Remove installed addon
precondition: At least one addon is installed
steps: 1. Go to Addon Manager 2. Find an installed addon 3. Tap remove/delete option 4. Confirm removal
expected_result: Addon is removed from the list and its content is no longer accessible

title: Reorder addons
steps: 1. Go to Addon Manager 2. Enter reorder mode 3. Drag an addon to a new position 4. Save the order
expected_result: Addon order is saved and reflected in catalog display priority

title: Browse community addons
precondition: App is open and network is available
steps: 1. Go to Addon Manager 2. Navigate to Community Addons section 3. Browse available addons
expected_result: List of community addons loads and displays with names and descriptions

title: Install community addon
steps: 1. Browse community addons 2. Select an addon 3. Tap Install
expected_result: Community addon is installed and added to the addon list

title: Enable and disable addon
precondition: At least one addon is installed
steps: 1. Go to Addon Manager 2. Find an installed addon 3. Toggle the enable/disable switch
expected_result: Addon is disabled (content hidden) or enabled (content visible) accordingly

title: Install duplicate addon with same ID
steps: 1. Go to Addon Manager 2. Try to install the same addon URL again
expected_result: App handles duplicate gracefully - either updates existing or allows multiple instances

title: Refresh addon list
steps: 1. Go to Addon Manager 2. Pull to refresh or tap refresh button
expected_result: Addon manifests are refreshed from their sources

title: Authenticate with Trakt
precondition: App is open and Trakt is not connected
steps: 1. Go to Settings 2. Navigate to Trakt settings 3. Tap Connect to Trakt 4. Complete OAuth flow in browser 5. Return to app
expected_result: Trakt account is connected and username is displayed

title: Disconnect from Trakt
steps: 1. Go to Settings 2. Navigate to Trakt settings 3. Tap Disconnect
expected_result: Trakt account is disconnected and sync features are disabled

title: Sync watch history to Trakt
precondition: Trakt is connected and local watch history exists
steps: 1. Enable Trakt autosync in settings 2. Watch content to completion
expected_result: Watched content is synced to Trakt history

title: Import watch history from Trakt
precondition: Trakt is connected with existing watch history
steps: 1. Connect Trakt account 2. Enable sync 3. Trigger manual sync or wait for auto-sync
expected_result: Trakt watch history appears in Continue Watching section

title: Scrobble during playback
precondition: Trakt is connected and video is playing
steps: 1. Play content for more than a few minutes
expected_result: Trakt scrobble is active showing currently watching status

title: Mark episode as watched
precondition: Trakt is connected and series episode is displayed
steps: 1. Navigate to a series episode 2. Long press or find mark as watched option 3. Mark as watched
expected_result: Episode is marked as watched on Trakt and locally

title: Mark movie as watched
precondition: Trakt is connected and movie is displayed
steps: 1. Navigate to a movie 2. Long press or find mark as watched option 3. Mark as watched
expected_result: Movie is marked as watched on Trakt and locally

title: View Trakt watchlist
precondition: Trakt is connected with items in watchlist
steps: 1. Navigate to Library or Trakt section 2. View watchlist
expected_result: Trakt watchlist items are displayed

title: View Trakt collection
precondition: Trakt is connected with items in collection
steps: 1. Navigate to Library or Trakt section 2. View collection
expected_result: Trakt collection items are displayed

title: Save playback position automatically
steps: 1. Play a video for several minutes 2. Exit the player
expected_result: Playback position is saved automatically

title: Display continue watching section
precondition: Watch progress exists for at least one item
steps: 1. Open the app 2. Navigate to Home screen
expected_result: Continue Watching section displays with items showing progress indicators

title: Resume from continue watching card
steps: 1. Find an item in Continue Watching 2. Tap the item 3. Start playback
expected_result: Video resumes from the saved position

title: Up next episode suggestion
steps: 1. Watch a series episode to near completion 2. Let it finish
expected_result: Up Next card appears suggesting the next episode

title: Clear watch progress for item
steps: 1. Find item with watch progress 2. Long press or access options 3. Clear progress
expected_result: Watch progress is cleared and item removed from Continue Watching

title: Progress percentage display
steps: 1. View Continue Watching section
expected_result: Progress bar shows accurate percentage of content watched

title: Continue watching limit (30 items)
precondition: More than 30 items have watch progress
steps: 1. Watch many different items 2. View Continue Watching
expected_result: Only the 30 most recent items are shown in Continue Watching

title: Display catalog rows from addons
precondition: At least one addon with catalogs is installed
steps: 1. Open the app 2. Navigate to Home screen
expected_result: Catalog rows from installed addons are displayed with content posters

title: Load featured content
precondition: Addon with featured content is installed
steps: 1. Open the app 2. View Home screen hero section
expected_result: Featured content displays with poster/backdrop and metadata

title: Navigate to content details
precondition: Content is visible on Home screen
steps: 1. Tap on any content poster
expected_result: Content details screen opens with full metadata

title: Pull to refresh
steps: 1. Pull down from top of Home screen
expected_result: Catalogs refresh and reload content from sources

title: Display This Week section
precondition: This Week section is enabled in settings
steps: 1. View Home screen
expected_result: This Week section shows recently aired episodes for tracked series

title: Toggle This Week section
steps: 1. Go to Settings 2. Find This Week toggle 3. Disable it 4. Return to Home
expected_result: This Week section is hidden when disabled

title: Manage catalog visibility
steps: 1. Go to catalog settings 2. Toggle visibility of specific catalogs 3. Return to Home
expected_result: Only enabled catalogs are displayed on Home screen

title: Load more content in catalog
steps: 1. Scroll to end of a catalog row 2. Continue scrolling or tap load more
expected_result: Additional content loads and appends to the catalog

title: Search for content by title
precondition: App is open with addons configured
steps: 1. Navigate to Search screen 2. Enter a search query (e.g. movie title) 3. Submit search
expected_result: Search results display matching content from all searchable addons

title: Display search results grid
steps: 1. Perform a search with results
expected_result: Results display in a grid/list with posters and titles

title: Navigate to result details
steps: 1. Tap on a search result
expected_result: Content details screen opens for the selected item

title: Clear search query
steps: 1. Tap the clear button in search field
expected_result: Search query is cleared and results are hidden or reset

title: Handle no results
steps: 1. Enter a search query with no matches
expected_result: Appropriate No results found message is displayed

title: Display movie metadata
steps: 1. Navigate to a movie
expected_result: Movie details show: title, year, runtime, description, genres, rating

title: Display series metadata
steps: 1. Navigate to a series
expected_result: Series details show: title, years, description, genres, rating, season count

title: Select season
precondition: Series with multiple seasons is displayed
steps: 1. Open a series with multiple seasons 2. Tap season selector 3. Select a different season
expected_result: Episode list updates to show selected season episodes

title: Display episode list
steps: 1. Navigate to a series
expected_result: Episode list shows episode numbers, titles, and thumbnails

title: View cast information
precondition: Content with cast data is displayed
steps: 1. Scroll to cast section on details screen
expected_result: Cast members are displayed with names and photos

title: View IMDB rating
precondition: Content with IMDB ID is displayed
steps: 1. View content details
expected_result: IMDB rating is displayed with score

title: Play content from details
steps: 1. Tap Play button on details screen
expected_result: Stream selection opens or playback begins

title: Add to library
steps: 1. Tap Add to Library button
expected_result: Content is saved to library and button state updates

title: Remove from library
steps: 1. Navigate to saved content 2. Tap Remove from Library
expected_result: Content is removed from library

title: TMDB enrichment
precondition: TMDB enrichment is enabled in settings
steps: 1. View content details
expected_result: Additional metadata from TMDB is displayed (logos, backdrop, extended info)

title: Display available streams
steps: 1. Select Play on content 2. View stream selection screen
expected_result: Available streams are listed with quality and source info

title: Auto-select first stream
precondition: Auto-play is enabled and content has streams
steps: 1. Navigate to content 2. Tap Play
expected_result: First available stream is automatically selected and playback begins

title: Filter streams by provider
steps: 1. Open stream selection 2. Tap on a provider filter
expected_result: Only streams from selected provider are shown

title: Select specific stream
steps: 1. Open stream selection 2. Tap on a specific stream
expected_result: Selected stream begins playing

title: Handle no streams available
precondition: Content with no available streams is selected
steps: 1. Try to play content with no streams
expected_result: Appropriate message displayed indicating no streams found

title: Change app theme
steps: 1. Go to Settings 2. Navigate to Theme settings 3. Select a different theme
expected_result: App theme changes to selected option

title: Configure TMDB API key
steps: 1. Go to Settings 2. Navigate to TMDB settings 3. Enter API key 4. Save
expected_result: TMDB API key is saved and TMDB features become available

title: Change app language
steps: 1. Go to Settings 2. Navigate to Language settings 3. Select a different language
expected_result: App UI text changes to selected language

title: Configure player default settings
steps: 1. Go to Settings 2. Navigate to Player settings 3. Adjust default playback speed or other settings
expected_result: Settings are saved and applied to future playback sessions

title: Toggle TMDB enrichment
steps: 1. Go to Settings 2. Find TMDB enrichment toggle 3. Toggle off
expected_result: Content details no longer show TMDB-enriched data when disabled

title: View legal information
steps: 1. Go to Settings 2. Navigate to Legal/About section
expected_result: Legal information, licenses, and attributions are displayed

title: Access developer options
steps: 1. Go to Settings 2. Navigate to Developer Options
expected_result: Developer options are accessible for debugging

title: Add plugin repository
steps: 1. Go to Plugins 2. Add new repository URL 3. Confirm
expected_result: Repository is added and plugins are loaded

title: Install plugin from repository
steps: 1. Go to Plugins 2. Browse available plugins 3. Install a plugin
expected_result: Plugin is installed and available for use

title: Test plugin functionality
steps: 1. Go to Plugin Test screen 2. Enter test parameters 3. Run test
expected_result: Plugin executes and returns results

title: Enable and disable plugin
steps: 1. Go to Plugins 2. Find installed plugin 3. Toggle enable/disable
expected_result: Plugin is enabled or disabled affecting its functionality

title: Remove plugin repository
steps: 1. Go to Plugins 2. Find repository 3. Remove repository
expected_result: Repository and its plugins are removed

title: Navigate with D-pad
steps: 1. Use D-pad to navigate through Home screen 2. Select content with center button
expected_result: All UI elements are navigable with D-pad and properly focused

title: Focus management on Home
steps: 1. Navigate away from Home 2. Press Back to return to Home
expected_result: Focus returns to the previously focused item

title: Remote control playback
steps: 1. Use Play/Pause button on remote 2. Use Fast Forward/Rewind buttons
expected_result: Playback responds to all remote control commands

title: Navigate sidebar with D-pad
steps: 1. Press Left from main content 2. Navigate sidebar options
expected_result: Sidebar is accessible and navigable with D-pad

title: Touch gesture controls
steps: 1. Play a video 2. Use touch gestures (double tap, swipe)
expected_result: All touch gestures work correctly for playback control

title: Orientation handling
steps: 1. Start video playback 2. Rotate device
expected_result: Player handles orientation change smoothly without losing playback state

title: In-app update download
steps: 1. App notifies of available update 2. Tap to download 3. Install update
expected_result: Update downloads and installs within the app

title: Touch gesture controls
steps: 1. Play a video 2. Use touch gestures (double tap, swipe)
expected_result: All touch gestures work correctly for playback control

title: Handle escape key on macOS
steps: 1. Play a video 2. Press Escape key
expected_result: Player exits or controls respond appropriately without crashing

title: Orientation handling on iPad
steps: 1. Start video playback 2. Rotate device
expected_result: Player handles orientation change smoothly
